page.title: 03OLDER HOUSES IN ROMSEY
page.content: A few of the houses in the villages are very old. My own house is over 200 years old and it was made out of oak wood beams, mud, clay, flint, stones. First oak beams were banged into the ground to make a frame, then a clay layer was put over the mud. This was done in the summer, so the clay dried quickly and became waterproof then for a year the mud dried more slowly which then made the walls rock hard. My house is thatched like a few more houses in our road. My house, like many of today's old homes, have been partly rebuilt in some places. Old walls have been knocked down and then bricked up using modern bricks so they last longer.
